quote: “Life shouldn’t have to be happy, and smiley all the time. We have so many feelings, and emotions. If we can embrace them all, and accept those are the right ways life can be so much more beautiful.”
“Behaviors or characteristics education is totally different from professional or career education. That’s why nowadays many can earn but doesn’t have any idea how to live with that.”
“Medicine should be according to the patient. It shouldn’t be according to the doctor ‘s mind.”
“You are on your own. It’s your freedom to choose a side.”
“Don’t get upset. Don’t talk to people too much. only important works, important talks. Otherwise, it will remove your focus. Also, they will be the ones who will hurt you first.”
